name: Nowhere District (Demo)
description:
Saiki Osen (狭絵紀), an introverted, secretive school girl, finds a file on her flip phone named "access.txt" which contains the passcode to a forum on the darknet known as DarkChan.

However, the forum link is known by few and only one person - Shirou "shis" Sagi - is known to have the link. Saiki scouts out the person in the one MMO that he plays - Nowhere District.

The demo takes about 10 minutes to complete.

Warning - Contains swearing, loud audio and screen flashes

Created with RPG Maker VX Ace.
